title: The Hunter Diaries Anthology
description: Duty, family, loyalties, and passion â€¦when your life is placed on the line which comes first? In rainy Seattle, Washington the Wills family and their friends must choose between family obligation and love. Will they be able to push prejudice aside and overcome seemingly insurmountable odds? Danger shadows their every step as they learn that good and evil is not all black and white.The Hunter Diaries Anthology is the complete set of short stories in The Hunter Diaries. Paranormal romance.
author: Serena Zane
